title: Suggestion for a flip display font?
content:
Hi,  
Im doing a design for a website that gonna present different trips so I had the idea of present all the information as it is on those flip displays on airports. I thought maybe some dot matrix kind of font but I think I want some more mechanic look, more towards Alpha Headline. But that's too round for my taste.

Anyone have any suggestion?  
Would appreciate any input.
author: 1UP

comments.content:
Here's a good idea of a "dot font".  
 [http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/16/Flip-dots.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720132743/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/16/Flip-dots.jpg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/16/Flip-dots.jpg")

Anyone know which one it could be?

Thanks for the link.  
I have a couple of dot matrix fonts myself but Im looking more for "mechanic" look. Sorry if I was unclear in my description. I wanna compare the dot matrix against another one.

Thanks.
